verses.roman:
dāmodara-svarūpa--'prema-rasa' mūrtimān
yāṅra saṅge haila vraja-madhura-rasa-jñāna

synonyms: dāmodara-svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; prema-rasa—the transcendental mellows of ecstatic love; mūrtimān—personified; yāṅra saṅge—by whose association; haila—there was; vraja—of Vraja; madhura-rasa—of the mellow of conjugal love; jñāna—knowledge.
translation: "The transcendental mellow of ecstatic love is personified by Svarūpa Dāmodara. By his association I have understood Vṛndāvana's transcendental mellow of conjugal love.
